sourcesContent:
// HTML Template Generator for Purchase Order Form // This file contains the logic to generate HTML from React state export function generateHTMLMirror(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder) { // Find where the title field is located (it could be in either section after swapping) const titleFieldInCompany = companyFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleFieldInPO = purchaseOrderFields.find(field => field.isTitle); const titleField = titleFieldInCompany || titleFieldInPO; // Determine which column should show the title and which should show regular fields const leftColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInCompany; const rightColumnHasTitle = !!titleFieldInPO; // Get fields for left and right columns (excluding title from both) const leftColumnFields = companyFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); const rightColumnFields = purchaseOrderFields.filter(field => !field.isTitle); return `
${leftColumnHasTitle ? ` ` : ''}
${titleField?.label || 'Purchase Order'}
${leftColumnFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
${rightColumnHasTitle ? ` ` : ''}
${titleField?.label || 'Purchase Order'}
${rightColumnFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
VENDOR
${vendorFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
SHIP TO
${shipToFields.map(field => `
${field.label}
`).join('')}
REQUISITIONER SHIP VIA F.O.B. SHIPPING TERMS
${[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map(row => ` `).join('')}
Item# Description Qty Rate Amount
Comments or Special Instructions
SUBTOTAL:
TAX:
SHIPPING:
OTHER:
TOTAL:
Contact Information:
`; } // XML Template Generator for NetSuite export function generateXMLTemplate(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder) { console.log('ðŸš€ Starting XML generation with translator...'); // Use the translator to map React data to NetSuite structure const translatedData = translateReactDataToNetSuite(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder); console.log('ðŸ“Š XML Generation - Translated data:', translatedData); // Build XML string step by step to avoid template literal conflicts let xmlContent = '\n'; xmlContent += '\n'; xmlContent += '\n'; xmlContent += '\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' <#if .locale == "zh_CN">\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' <#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' <#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' <#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' <#elseif .locale == "th_TH">\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' <#if companyInformation.logoUrl?length != 0>\n'; xmlContent += ' <@filecabinet nstype="image" style="float: left; margin: 7px" src="${companyInformation.logoUrl}" />\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' ' + translatedData.companyInfo.companyName + '
\n'; xmlContent += ' ' + translatedData.companyInfo.addressText + '\n'; xmlContent += ' 		' + translatedData.poInfo.title + '
#' + translatedData.poInfo.poNumber + '
' + translatedData.poInfo.date + '
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' of \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; // Add styles xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '\n'; xmlContent += '\n'; xmlContent += '\n'; // Add header section with React data xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; // Add right column xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; // Add title if left column has it if (translatedData.leftSection.some(f => f.isTitle)) { xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; } // Add left column fields xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' ' + translatedData.poInfo.title + '\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; translatedData.leftSection.filter(field => !field.isTitle).forEach(field => { xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
' + field.label + '\n'; xmlContent += ' ' + (field.value || field.placeholder) + '\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; }); xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' 		\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; // Add title if right column has it if (translatedData.rightSection.some(f => f.isTitle)) { xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; } // Add right column fields xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' ' + translatedData.poInfo.title + '\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; translatedData.rightSection.filter(field => !field.isTitle).forEach(field => { xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; }); xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' ' + field.label + '\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' ' + (field.value || field.placeholder) + '\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; // Add vendor and ship-to sections xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
VENDOR
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; // Add vendor fields Object.entries(translatedData.vendorInfo).forEach(([key, value]) => { xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; }); xmlContent += '
' + (key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1)) + ': \n'; xmlContent += ' ' + value + '\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += ' 		\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += '
SHIP TO
\n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; // Add ship-to fields Object.entries(translatedData.shipToInfo).forEach(([key, value]) => { xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; xmlContent += ' \n'; }); xmlContent += '
' + (key.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + key.slice(1)) + ': \n'; xmlContent += ' ' + value + '\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; xmlContent += '
\n'; // Close XML xmlContent += '\n'; xmlContent += ''; console.log('âœ… XML generation completed with React data'); return xmlContent; } // NetSuite XML Data Translator // This function maps React form data to the correct NetSuite XML structure function translateReactDataToNetSuite(companyFields, purchaseOrderFields, vendorFields, shipToFields, sectionOrder) { console.log('ðŸ”„ Starting NetSuite data translation...'); // Extract company information const companyInfo = { companyName: companyFields.find(f => f.id === 'company-name')?.value || 'Company Name', addressText: companyFields.find(f => f.id === 'company-address')?.value || 'Address', cityStateZip: companyFields.find(f => f.id === 'company-city-state')?.value || 'City, State ZIP', phone: companyFields.find(f => f.id === 'company-phone')?.value || 'Phone', fax: companyFields.find(f => f.id === 'company-fax')?.value || 'Fax', website: companyFields.find(f => f.id === 'company-website')?.value || 'Website' }; // Extract purchase order information const poInfo = { title: purchaseOrderFields.find(f => f.isTitle)?.value || 'Purchase Order', date: purchaseOrderFields.find(f => f.id === 'po-date')?.value || 'Date', poNumber: purchaseOrderFields.find(f => f.id === 'po-number')?.value || 'PO Number' }; // Extract vendor information const vendorInfo = { company: vendorFields.find(f => f.id === 'vendor-company')?.value || 'Vendor Company', contact: vendorFields.find(f => f.id === 'vendor-contact')?.value || 'Vendor Contact', address: vendorFields.find(f => f.id === 'vendor-address')?.value || 'Vendor Address', cityState: vendorFields.find(f => f.id === 'vendor-city-state')?.value || 'Vendor City/State', phone: vendorFields.find(f => f.id === 'vendor-phone')?.value || 'Vendor Phone' }; // Extract ship-to information const shipToInfo = { name: shipToFields.find(f => f.id === 'ship-to-name')?.value || 'Ship To Name', company: shipToFields.find(f => f.id === 'ship-to-company')?.value || 'Ship To Company', address: shipToFields.find(f => f.id === 'ship-to-address')?.value || 'Ship To Address', cityState: shipToFields.find(f => f.id === 'ship-to-city-state')?.value || 'Ship To City/State', phone: shipToFields.find(f => f.id === 'ship-to-phone')?.value || 'Ship To Phone' }; // Determine section layout based on sectionOrder const leftSection = sectionOrder[0] === 'section1' ? companyFields : purchaseOrderFields; const rightSection = sectionOrder[0] === 'section1' ? purchaseOrderFields : companyFields; console.log('ðŸ”„ Translation completed:', { companyInfo, poInfo, vendorInfo, shipToInfo, sectionOrder, leftSection: leftSection.map(f => ({ id: f.id, label: f.label, value: f.value })), rightSection: rightSection.map(f => ({ id: f.id, label: f.label, value: f.value })) }); return { companyInfo, poInfo, vendorInfo, shipToInfo, leftSection, rightSection, sectionOrder }; }
